duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide world class customer service to guests and promote the benefits of becoming a CLUB Member.
Execute account servicing, including acquiring and activating new members, CLUB sales, and customer experience.
Demonstrate products to customers and remain knowledgeable of advertised sales.
Keep CLUB inventory accurate, clean, and organized.
Provide full CLUB Member experience including processing payments, answering account questions, and processing applications.
Provide daily feedback and reports, peer coaching, recognition, and support as a CLUB advocate and representative.
Serve all areas of the store based on business needs.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or equivalent experience
